chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
dp_2xy: dio_polynomial nat nat -> dio_polynomial nat nat -> dio_polynomial nat nat
dp_x2y2: dio_polynomial nat nat -> dio_polynomial nat nat -> dio_polynomial nat nat
v: dio_polynomial nat nat
u: dio_polynomial nat nat

Goal:
dp_size (dp_2xy u v) = 3 + dp_size u + dp_size v

Premises:
dp_size : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> nat
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
dp_size_fix_comp : forall (V P : Set) (o : dio_op) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_size (dp_comp o p q) = 1 + dp_size p + dp_size q
dio_elem.complete_lemma : forall x y : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | u + x = v + y}}
Inductive dio_polynomial (V P : Set) : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial V P | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P -> dio_polynomial V P Arguments dio_polynomial (_ _)%type_scope Arguments dp_nat {V P}%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments dp_var {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_par {V P}%type_scope Arguments dp_comp {V P}%type_scope
gcd.bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ gcd.is_gcd p q g /\ gcd.is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
dp_eval : forall V P : Set, (V -> nat) -> (P -> nat) -> dio_polynomial V P -> nat
dio_polynomial_rec : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Set), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_sind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rect : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Type), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_polynomial_ind : forall (V P : Set) (P0 : dio_polynomial V P -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial V P), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial V P, P0 d
dio_single_pred : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P -> (P -> nat) -> Prop
dio_elem.g0 = fun n x0 x1 x2 x3 x4 x5 x6 x7 m : nat => if le_lt_dec n m then match m - n with | 0 => x0 | 1 => x1 | 2 => x2 | 3 => x3 | 4 => x4 | 5 => x5 | 6 => x6 | S (S (S (S (S (S (S _)))))) => x7 end else x0 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments dio_elem.g0 (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%nat_scope
dp_eval_ext : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (φ' : V -> nat) (ν' : P -> nat) (p : dio_polynomial V P), (forall v : V, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i : P, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p
valuation_one_union : forall (k v : nat) (i1 : interval) (g1 : nat -> nat) (i2 : interval) (g2 : nat -> nat), ~ in_interval (interval_union i1 i2) k -> interval_disjoint i1 i2 -> {g : nat -> nat | g k = v /\ (forall x : nat, in_interval i1 x -> g x = g1 x) /\ (forall x : nat, in_interval i2 x -> g x = g2 x)}
df_size = fix df_size (f : dio_formula) : nat := match f with | df_op _ _ _ _ => 5 | df_bin _ f0 g => 1 + df_size f0 + df_size g | ∃ f0 => 1 + df_size f0 | _ => 3 end : dio_formula -> nat
df_mconj_size : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> dio_formula), df_size (df_mconj n f) = 4 + n + ∑ n (fun i : nat => df_size (f i))
Inductive dio_formula : Set := df_cst : nat -> nat -> dio_formula | df_eq : nat -> nat -> dio_formula | df_op : dio_op -> nat -> nat -> nat -> dio_formula | df_bin : dio_op -> dio_formula -> dio_formula -> dio_formula | df_exst : dio_formula -> dio_formula Arguments df_cst (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments df_eq (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments df_op _ (_ _ _)%nat_scope
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
gcd.is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => gcd.divides r p /\ gcd.divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, gcd.divides k p -> gcd.divides k q -> gcd.divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
dp_par_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list P
dp_var_list : forall V P : Set, dio_polynomial V P -> list V
Inductive dio_elem_expr : Set := dee_nat : nat -> dio_elem_expr | dee_var : nat -> dio_elem_expr | dee_par : nat -> dio_elem_expr | dee_comp : dio_op -> nat -> nat -> dio_elem_expr Arguments dee_nat _%nat_scope Arguments dee_var _%nat_scope Arguments dee_par _%nat_scope Arguments dee_comp _ (_ _)%nat_scope
gcd.euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
de_op_sem = fun o : dio_op => match o with | do_add => Init.Nat.add | do_mul => Init.Nat.mul end : dio_op -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments de_op_sem _ (_ _)%nat_scope
dio_repr_at_exst : forall (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n m p : nat), dio_repr_at R a n p -> m = n + 1 -> dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => exists n0 : nat, R n0·ν) a m p
Build_dio_repr_at : forall (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n l : nat) (ds_eqns : list dio_constraint) (ds_ref : nat), length ds_eqns = l -> (forall (x : nat) (c : dio_constraint), In c ds_eqns -> dc_vars c x -> a <= x < a + n) -> a <= ds_ref < a + n -> (forall ν : nat -> nat, exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns) -> (forall ν : nat -> nat, R ν <-> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns /\ φ ds_ref = 0)) -> dio_repr_at R a n l
gcd.bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> gcd.is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
dio_single = fun V P : Set => (dio_polynomial V P * dio_polynomial V P)%type : Set -> Set -> Set Arguments dio_single (_ _)%type_scope
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (V P : Set) (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial V P), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
dio_repr_at_bin : forall (o : dio_op) (R1 : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a1 n1 p1 : nat) (R2 : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a2 n2 p2 n : nat), dio_repr_at R1 a1 n1 p1 -> dio_repr_at R2 a2 n2 p2 -> a1 + n1 <= a2 -> n = 1 + a2 + n2 - a1 -> dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => df_op_sem o (R1 ν) (R2 ν)) a1 n (1 + p1 + p2)
dee_vars = fun (e : dio_elem_expr) (x : nat) => match e with | dee_var v => x = v | dee_comp _ v w => x = v \/ x = w | _ => False end : dio_elem_expr -> nat -> Prop Arguments dee_vars _ _%nat_scope
df_weight_1 = fix df_weight_1 (f : dio_formula) : nat := match f with | df_op _ _ _ _ => 8 | df_bin _ f0 g => 1 + df_weight_1 f0 + df_weight_1 g | ∃ f0 => 1 + df_weight_1 f0 | _ => 6 end : dio_formula -> nat
dc_dec = fun (k : nat) (c : dio_constraint) => (fst c, dee_dec k (snd c)) : nat -> dio_constraint -> nat * dio_elem_expr Arguments dc_dec _%nat_scope
dio_repr_at_cst : forall x i a : nat, dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = i) a 6 5
df_weight_2 = fix df_weight_2 (f : dio_formula) : nat := match f with | df_op _ _ _ _ => 7 | df_bin _ f0 g => 1 + df_weight_2 f0 + df_weight_2 g | ∃ f0 => df_weight_2 f0 | _ => 5 end : dio_formula -> nat
dio_repr_at_eq : forall x y a : nat, dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = ν y) a 6 5
Record dio_repr_at (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n l : nat) : Set := Build_dio_repr_at { ds_eqns : list dio_constraint; ds_ref : nat; ds_H0 : length ds_eqns = l; ds_H1 : forall (x : nat) (c : dio_constraint), In c ds_eqns -> dc_vars c x -> a <= x < a + n; ds_H2 : a <= ds_ref < a + n; ds_H3 : forall ν : nat -> nat, exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns; ds_H4 : forall ν : nat -> nat, R ν < -> (exists φ : nat -> nat, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) ds_eqns /\ φ ds_ref = 0) } Arguments dio_repr_at _%function_scope (_ _ _)%nat_scope Arguments Build_dio_repr_at _%function_scope [a]%nat_scope _%nat_scope [l]%nat_scope [ds_eqns]%list_scope [ds_ref]%nat_scope _ _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
BinNatDef.N.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => BinNums.N0 | S n' => BinNums.Npos (BinPos.Pos.of_succ_nat n') end : nat -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.of_nat _%nat_scope
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => BinNums.Z0 | S n0 => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_nat _%nat_scope
dio_repr_at_op : forall (o : dio_op) (x y z a : nat), dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => ν x = de_op_sem o (ν y) (ν z)) a 8 7
df_mconj = fix df_mconj (n : nat) (f : nat -> dio_formula) {struct n} : dio_formula := match n with | 0 => df_true | S n0 => f 0 ∧ df_mconj n0 f⭳ end : nat -> (nat -> dio_formula) -> dio_formula Arguments df_mconj _%nat_scope _%function_scope
